title: Augmented Reality-Based Social-Emotional Learning Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency, fundamental understanding of learning disabilities
context.additional_context: Program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Targets pre-service teachers in elementary education and job seekers in related fields

learning_goals: Achieve 80% or higher competency in performing social situation simulations in augmented reality environments.
Meet 70% or higher of role-play evaluation criteria utilizing emotion recognition and regulation techniques.
Achieve a 90% or higher completion rate for collaborative projects with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
